content:
I've updated the **Notion DB Definitions** document with a new section for **Personal Knowledge Database (PKD)** and formatted it to match our **Knowledge Vault** structure.

Here’s the review process:
1️⃣ **Review & Confirm Property Definitions**
2️⃣ **Update Definitions in the Canvas**
3️⃣ **Proceed to Sample Data Entry**
4️⃣ **Finalize & Link Relationships**

---
### **PKD - Property Definitions & Requirements**

| **Property**                | **Type**         | **Required?**  | **Description** | **Comments/Questions** |
|-----------------------------|-----------------|---------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------|
| **Name**                    | Text            | 🟦 Required  | The title of the personal knowledge insight. | - |
| **Tags**                    | Multi-select    | 🟦 Required  | Categorization for filtering and indexing. | Ensures easy retrieval across topics. |
| **Insight Summary**         | Text (Short)    | 🟦 Required  | A concise summary of the insight stored here. | AI auto-generates, human can refine. |
| **Detailed Insight**        | Text (Long)     | 🟦 Required  | A full explanation of this knowledge entry. | Required for storing key learnings or overrides. |
| **Contradicts AI?**         | Checkbox        | ❌ Not Required | Marks if this knowledge entry overrides AI recommendations. | AI should flag contradictions in real-time. |
| **AI Recommendation on Conflict** | Text (Long) | ❌ Not Required | AI’s counter-argument or response when this contradicts its base logic. | - |
| **Influencer/Source**       | Relation (AI Influencers) | ❌ Not Required | Connects this insight to an external influencer, if applicable. | If personal experience only, leave blank. |
| **Knowledge Vault**         | Relation (Knowledge Vault) | ❌ Not Required | Links this insight to relevant stored knowledge. | - |
| **Relevance to Jesse**      | Multi-select    | 🟦 Required  | Defines how this insight applies to decision-making. | Ensures correct integration into recommendations. |
| **Date Added**              | Date            | 🟦 Required  | The date this insight was added. | Auto-generated by system. |
| **Last Modified**           | Date            | ❌ Not Required | Tracks last update to this insight. | - |
| **Priority Level**          | Select          | ❌ Not Required | Urgent, High, Medium, Low. | Only used if this insight is time-sensitive. |
| **Action Required?**        | Checkbox        | ❌ Not Required | Flags if this insight requires action or verification. | - |
| **Notes & Comments**        | Text (Long)     | ❌ Not Required | Additional notes, context, or clarifications. | - |

---
### **Key Takeaways:**
✅ **AI-Generated Insights:** AI will generate initial summaries, but human oversight ensures accuracy.  
✅ **Overrides Handled Systematically:** Contradictions between AI logic and PKD insights will trigger a review.  
✅ **Structured for Decision-Making:** Every insight is categorized for relevance, ensuring correct retrieval in recommendations.  
✅ **Integrated with Knowledge Vault & Influencers:** Ensuring a seamless relationship between external knowledge and personal insights.  

---
### **Next Steps**
1️⃣ **Confirm or Adjust Property Definitions**  
2️⃣ **Update Canvas Documentation**  
3️⃣ **Proceed to Sample Data Population**  
4️⃣ **Review Relationship Linking**

🚀 **Let me know if this is locked in!**
